member.name: T:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions
member.summary: Config for the Jaeger Client, see more https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger-client-csharp

member.name: P:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions.ServiceName
member.summary: Service Name, default is the Application Name

member.name: P:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions.AfterSamplerConfig
member.summary: Callback after finish setup SamplerConfiguration, allow you adjust setup for SamplerConfiguration
member.remarks: If the result of your callback is null then stop add Jaeger Service

member.name: P:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions.AfterReporterConfig
member.summary: Callback after finish setup SamplerConfiguration, allow you adjust setup for SamplerConfiguration
member.remarks: If the result of your callback is null then stop add Jaeger Service

member.name: P:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions.AfterGlobalConfig
member.summary: Callback after finish setup Configuration, allow you adjust setup for Configuration
member.remarks: If the result of your callback is null then stop add Jaeger Service

member.name: P:Elect.Jaeger.Models.ElectJaegerOptions.AfterTracer
member.summary: Callback after finish config Tracer, allow you adjust config for Tracer
